content: 4 10 cm in stockinette approx 5 x 7 sts per 1 2 5 cm after blocking <big><big>needles</big></big> shorter needles us 4 3 5 mm 16 40 cm circular needles dpns or addi flexiflips 5 for sleeves if not using magic loop larger sizes will be able to use a 16 40 cm circ for sleeves longer needles - us 4 3 5 mm 24 80 cm circular needles or length needed to knit body circumference <big><big>notions</big></big> between 20-36 stitch markers depending on size tapestry needle scrap yarn or stitch holders scissors <big><big>techniques</big></big> cast on knit purl yarn over increasing decreasing cable cast-on lace bind-off > **i d love to see your tee ** > > share on instagram 6 using the hashtag > #mysteriumtee 7 and tag me @dearingenue 8 > > need answers to your questions or want > to share your progress > > join my ravelry group dear ingénue > knits 9 for pattern support the > designer may be contacted at > dear ingenue knits@gmail com 1 https //www dearingenue com/links 2 https //www instagram com/dearingenue 4 https //www makersmercantile com/shop/c/p/popcycle-by-hikoo-x46266201 htm 5 https //www makersmercantile com/iishop form_version=2&showsearchresults=1&search_keyword=flexiflips&image=search 6 https //www instagram com/dearingenue/ hl=en 7 https //www instagram com/explore/tags/mysteriumtee/ 8 https //www instagram com/dearingenue 9 https //bit ly/dearingenueknits
